description.oldValue: This feature enables IT admins to block anonymous users from accessing the chat in internally hosted meetings by disabling the read access on top of the existing disabled right access.
description.newValue: This feature enables IT admins to block anonymous users from accessing the chat in internally hosted meetings by disabling the read access on top of the existing disabled right access. Due to service issues, we have decided to forgo Targeted Release in favor of rolling out straight to Standard.
